variable.name: WGTBRTH
variable.comment: When you were born, about how much did you weigh? (Give your best guess.)

variable.name: FULLTERM
variable.comment: When you were born, were you: full-term, premature, don't know.

variable.name: TWIN
variable.comment: When you were born, were you a twin or triplet?

variable.name: BRSTFED
variable.comment: When you were a baby, did your mother breast feed you?

variable.name: COFFEEOS
variable.comment: Do you usually drink coffee each day?

variable.name: CUPREGOS
variable.comment:
How many cups of regular coffee (not decaf) do you usually drink each day? (Count tall [12 oz. or more] cups and espresso drinks made with double shots of espresso as 2 cups.)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q5 'Drink coffee each day'.

variable.name: CUPDECAF
variable.comment:
How many cups of decaf coffee do you usually drink each day? (Count tall [12 oz. or more] cups and espresso drinks made with double shots of espresso as 2 cups.)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q5 'Drink coffee each day'.

variable.name: COFDRIP
variable.comment:
How is the coffee usually made? (Mark one or two.) Drip
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q5 'Drink coffee each day'.

variable.name: COFESPRS
variable.comment:
How is the coffee usually made? (Mark one or two.) Espresso
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q5 'Drink coffee each day'.

variable.name: COFINST
variable.comment:
How is the coffee usually made? (Mark one or two.) Instant
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q5 'Drink coffee each day'.

variable.name: COFBOIL
variable.comment:
How is the coffee usually made? (Mark one or two.) Boiled
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q5 'Drink coffee each day'.

variable.name: COFPERC
variable.comment:
How is the coffee usually made? (Mark one or two.) Percolated
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q5 'Drink coffee each day'.

variable.name: COFPRESS
variable.comment:
How is the coffee usually made? (Mark one or two.) French Press
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q5 'Drink coffee each day'.

variable.name: TEA
variable.comment: The next set of questions ask about your coffee and tea drinking habits. Do you usually drink tea each day? (Do not include decaf or herbal tea.)

variable.name: CUPTEA
variable.comment:
How many cups of tea do you usally drink each day? (Do not include decaf or herbal tea.)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q6 'Drink tea each day'.

variable.name: ALCOHLOS
variable.comment: For the question below, one drink of alcohol is equal to one can of beer, one glass of wine, or one shot of liquor (whiskey, brandy or gin). During your entire life, have you had 12 drinks or more of any kind of alcoholic drink?

variable.name: DRNKAG14
variable.comment:
For the question below, one drink of alcohol is equal to one can of beer, one glass of wine, or one shot of liquor (whiskey, brandy or gin). When you were between 14 and 17 years old, how many drinks of alcohol did you usually have?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q7 '12 or more drinks'.
variable.value: None or less than 1 per month

variable.name: DRNKAG18
variable.comment:
For the question below, one drink of alcohol is equal to one can of beer, one glass of wine, or one shot of liquor (whiskey, brandy or gin). When you were between 18 and 22 years old, how many drinks of alcohol did you usually have?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q7 '12 or more drinks'.
variable.value: None or less than 1 per month

variable.name: DRNKAG23
variable.comment:
For the questions below, one drink of alcohol is equal to one can of beer, one glass of wine, or one shot of liquor (whiskey, brandy or gin). When you were between 23 and 29 years old, how many drinks of alcohol did you usually have?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q7 '12 or more drinks'.
variable.value: None or less than 1 per month

variable.name: DRNKAG30
variable.comment:
For the question below, one drink of alcohol is equal to one can of beer, one glass of wine, or one shot of liquor (whiskey, brandy or gin). When you were between 30 and 49 years old, how many drinks of alcohol did you usually have?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q7 '12 or more drinks'.
variable.value: None or less than 1 per month

variable.name: DRNKAG50
variable.comment:
For the question below, one drink of alcohol is equal to one can of beer, one glass of wine, or one shot of liquor (whiskey, brandy or gin). When you were about 50 years old, how many drinks of alcohol did you usually have?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q7 '12 or more drinks'.
variable.value: None or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CHLVSMK
variable.description: Lived with smoker as a child
variable.comment: As a child (less than 18 years old), did you ever live with someone who smoked cigarettes inside your home?

variable.name: CHLVSMKY
variable.description: Years as child lived with smoker
variable.comment: As a child, how many years did you live with someone who smoked inside your home? Sub-question of F42 V1 Q8 'Lived with smoker as child'.

variable.name: ADLVSMK
variable.comment: Since age 18, have you ever lived with someone (including a parent, husband, or other adult person) who smoked cigarettes inside your home?

variable.name: ADLVSMKY
variable.description: Years as adult lived with smoker
variable.comment:
Since age 18, how many years have you lived with someone who smoked cigarettes inside your home?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q9 'Lived with smoker after age 18'.

variable.name: LVSMKNW
variable.comment:
Does anyone living with you now smoke cigarettes inside your home?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q9 'Lived with smoker after age 18'.

variable.name: PTNRSMK
variable.comment:
Please mark all the people who live with you now and who smoke cigarettes inside your home. Husband or partner
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q9 'Lived with smoker after age 18'.
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q9.2 'Live with smoker now'.

variable.name: CHLDSMK
variable.comment:
Please mark all the people who live with you now and who smoke cigarettes inside your home. Son(s) or daughter(s)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q9 'Lived with smoker after age 18'.
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q9.2 'Live with smoker now'.

variable.name: OTHSMK
variable.comment:
Please mark all the people who live with you now and who smoke cigarettes inside your home. Other person/people
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q9 'Lived with smoker after age 18'.
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q9.2 'Live with smoker now'.

variable.name: WORKSMK
variable.comment: Have you ever worked in a space where people smoked cigarettes?

variable.name: WORKSMKY
variable.comment:
How many total years have you worked in a space where people smoked cigarettes?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q10 'Worked with smoker'.

variable.name: WRKSMKNW
variable.comment:
Do you now work in a space where people smoke?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q10 'Worked with smoker'.

variable.name: BSEEVR
variable.comment: Have you ever done a breast self-examination (a breast exam on yourself)?

variable.name: BSENUM1Y
variable.description: How many breast self exams in last 12 months
variable.comment:
How many times have you done a breast self-exam in the last 12 months?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q11 'Breast self-exam ever'.

variable.name: CBEEVR
variable.comment: Have you ever had a breast physical exam done by a doctor, nurse, or physician assistant?

variable.name: CBENUM5Y
variable.description: How many physical breast exams in last 5 years
variable.comment:
How many of these exams have you had in the last 5 years?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q12 'Physical breast exam ever'.

variable.name: CBELST
variable.description: How long ago was last breast exam
variable.comment:
How long ago did you last have a breast exam by a doctor, nurse, or physician assistant?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q12 'Physical breast exam ever'.

variable.name: BRSTDSOS
variable.comment: Has a doctor ever told you that you had benign breast disease or fibrocystic disease in your breasts?

variable.name: MAM5Y
variable.comment: Have you had a mammagram (x-ray of the breast to look for cancer or other breast problems) in the last 5 years?

variable.name: MAMNUM5Y
variable.description: How many mammograms in last 5 years
variable.comment:
How many mammograms have you had in the last 5 years?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q14 'Mammogram in last 5 years'.

variable.name: GENPWDR
variable.comment: Have you ever used powder on your private parts (genital areas)?

variable.name: GENPWDRY
variable.comment:
The next question asks about the use of powders (talc, baby powder, deodorant powder). For how many years?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q15 'Used powder on genitals'.

variable.name: DIAPHRAM
variable.comment: Did you ever use a diaphragm (a birth control device that fits over the opening of your womb)?

variable.name: DIAPWDR
variable.comment:
The next set of questions are about the use of powders (talc, baby powder, deodorant powder). Did you ever use powder on your diaphragm?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q16 'Ever use a diaphragm'.

variable.name: DIAPWDRY
variable.comment:
The next set of questions are about the use of powders (talc, baby powder, deodorant powder). For how many years did you use powder on your diaphragm? Sub-question of F42 V1 Q16 'Ever use a diaphragm'.
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q16.1 'Ever use powder on diaphragm'.

variable.name: PADPWDR
variable.description: Ever used powder on a sanitary napkin
variable.comment: The next set of questions are about the use of powders (talc, baby powder, deodorant powder). Did you ever use powder on a sanitary napkin or pad?

variable.name: PADPWDRY
variable.description: Years used powder on a sanitary napkin
variable.comment:
The next set of questions are about the use of powders (talc, baby powder, deodorant powder). For how many years did you use powder on sanitary pads?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q17 'Ever used powder on sanitary'.

variable.name: ELCBLKT
variable.comment: Have you ever used an electric blanket, electric mattress pad, or heated water bed on at least half the days in any one month period?

variable.name: ELCBLKTY
variable.comment:
How many years total did you use an electric blanket, electric mattress pad, or heated water bed?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q18 'Ever used electric blanket'.

variable.name: ELCBLKTM
variable.comment:
How many months per year did you use an electric blanket, electric mattress pad, or heated water bed on at least half the days of the month?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q18 'Ever used electric blanket'.

variable.name: ELCBLKON
variable.comment:
When you used the electric blanket, electric mattress pad, or heated water bed, did you leave it turned on most of the time while you were sleeping, or did you use it only to warm the bed before you went to sleep?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q18 'Ever used electric blanket'.

variable.name: ELCBLKPY
variable.description: Used an electric blanket during past year
variable.comment:
Have you used an electric blanket, electric mattress pad, or heated water bed during the past year?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q18 'Ever used electric blanket'.

variable.name: RELIGION
variable.comment: What is your religion?

variable.name: INDRCHOR
variable.comment: About how many hours each week do you usually spend doing heavy (strenous) indoor household chores such as scrubbing floors, sweeping, or vaccuuming?

variable.name: YRDWORKM
variable.comment: About how many months during the year do you usually do things in the yard, such as mowing, raking, gardening, or shoveling snow?

variable.name: YRDWRKH
variable.description: Hours in week doing yard work
variable.comment:
When you do these things in the yard, how many hours each week do you do them?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q21 'Months doing yard work'.

variable.name: SITTING
variable.comment: During a usual day and night, about how many hours do you spend sitting? Be sure to include the time you spend sitting at work, sitting at the table eating, driving or riding in a car or bus, and sitting up watching TV or talking.

variable.name: SLEEPING
variable.comment: During a usual day and night, about how many hours do you spend sleeping or lying down with your feet up? Be sure to include the time you spend sleeping or trying to sleep at night, resting or napping, and lying down watching TV.

variable.name: FARM
variable.description: Ever lived or worked on farm
variable.comment: Did you ever live or work on a farm?

variable.name: FARMY
variable.comment:
For how many years did you live or work on a farm?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q24 'Ever lived or worked on farm'.

variable.name: HAIRDYE
variable.description: Worked with hair dyes for year or more
variable.comment: Did you ever work for one year or more as a hairdresser, beautician, or cosmetologist where you worked with hair dyes?

variable.name: HAIRDYEY
variable.comment:
For how many years did you work as a hairdresser, beautician or cosmetologist?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q25 'Worked with hair dyes for year'.

variable.name: JOBPAID
variable.comment: Have you ever had a job for which you were paid?

variable.name: JOBAGE1
variable.comment:
What are the 3 full-time or part-time jobs that you have held the longest length of time since you were 18 years old? Please start with your most recent job. (If you worked less than one year at a job, write '01' in the boxes for total years worked.) Age Started this job (#1)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q26 'Ever had a paid job'.

variable.name: JOBY1
variable.comment:
What are the 3 full-time or part-time jobs that you have held the longest length of time since you were 18 years old? Please start with your most recent job. (If you worked less than one year at a job, write '01' in the boxes for total years worked.) Total number of years worked at this job (#1)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q26 'Ever had a paid job'.

variable.name: JOBAGE2
variable.comment:
What are the 3 full-time or part-time jobs that you have held the longest length of time since you were 18 years old? Please start with your most recent job. (If you worked less than one year at a job, write '01' in the boxes for total years worked.) Age Started this job (#2)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q26 'Ever had a paid job'.

variable.name: JOBY2
variable.comment:
What are the 3 full-time or part-time jobs that you have held the longest length of time since you were 18 years old? Please start with your most recent job. (If you worked less than one year at a job, write '01' in the boxes for total years worked.) Total number of years worked at this job (#2)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q26 'Ever had a paid job'.

variable.name: JOBAGE3
variable.comment:
What are the 3 full-time or part-time jobs that you have held the longest length of time since you were 18 years old? Please start with your most recent job. (If you worked less than one year at a job, write '01' in the boxes for total years worked.) Age Started this job (#3)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q26 'Ever had a paid job'.

variable.name: JOBY3
variable.comment:
What are the 3 full-time or part-time jobs that you have held the longest length of time since you were 18 years old? Please start with your most recent job. (If you worked less than one year at a job, write '01' in the boxes for total years worked.) Total number of years worked at this job (#3)
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q26 'Ever had a paid job'.

variable.name: HGTAG18F
variable.comment: How tall were you (without shoes on) at about age 18 (your tallest adult height) - feet

variable.name: HGTAG18I
variable.comment: How tall were you (without shoes on) at about age 18 (your tallest adult height) - inches

variable.name: WGTAG18
variable.comment: What was your weight at about age 18 (when you were not pregnant)?

variable.name: WGTAG35
variable.comment: What was your weight at about age 35 (when you were not pregnant)?

variable.name: WGTAG50
variable.comment: What was your weight at about age 50 (when you were not pregnant)?

variable.name: WGTMAX
variable.comment: What was your maximum adult weight (the most you ever weighed since you were 18 years old) when you were not pregnant?

variable.name: WGTMAX18
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your maximum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 18-29

variable.name: WGTMAX30
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your maximum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 30-39

variable.name: WGTMAX40
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your maximum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 40-49

variable.name: WGTMAX50
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your maximum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 50-59

variable.name: WGTMAX60
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your maximum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 60-69

variable.name: WGTMAX70
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your maximum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 70 years old or older

variable.name: WGTMIN
variable.comment: What was your minimum adult weight (the least you ever weighed since you were 18 years old)?

variable.name: WGTMIN18
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your minimum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 18-29

variable.name: WGTMIN30
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your minimum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 30-39

variable.name: WGTMIN40
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your minimum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 40-49

variable.name: WGTMIN50
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your minimum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 50-59

variable.name: WGTMIN60
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your minimum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 60-69

variable.name: WGTMIN70
variable.comment: How old were you when you were at your minimum adult weight? (Mark all that apply.) 70 years old or older

variable.name: LOST10LB
variable.comment: Within the last 20 years, when you were not pregnant or sick, did you ever lose 10 pounds or more on purpose?

variable.name: LOST50LB
variable.comment:
How many times did you lose 50 pounds or more?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q35 'Lost 10 pounds or more'.

variable.name: LST20_49
variable.comment:
How many times did you lose at least 20 pounds, but not more than 49 pounds?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q35 'Lost 10 pounds or more'.

variable.name: LST10_19
variable.comment:
How many times did you lose at least 10 pounds, but not more than 19 pounds?
Sub-question of F42 V1 Q35 'Lost 10 pounds or more'.

variable.name: CWGT10LB
variable.comment: How long have you been within 10 pounds of your current weight (do not count times when you were pregnant or sick)?

variable.name: LIVESTY
variable.comment: How many years have you lived in the state you now live in?

variable.name: USBORN
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, question 38. Indicator variable for whether the participant was born in the U.S.

variable.name: LVUSAG15
variable.description: Living in the U.S. at age 15
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, question 39. Indicator variable of whether the participant lived in the US at age 15.

variable.name: LVUSAG35
variable.description: Living in the U.S. at age 35
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, question 40. Indicator variable of whether the participant lived in the US at age 35.

variable.name: LVUSAG50
variable.description: Living in the U.S. at age 50
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, question 41. Indicator variable of whether the participant lived in the US at age 50.

variable.name: USLNG
variable.description: Lived in U.S. the longest of any country
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, question 42. Indicator variable of whether the participant has lived in the US the longest of any country.

variable.name: BRTHREGN
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, question 38. U.S. region of birth based on U.S. Census definition. If participant was born outside of the U.S., BRTHREGN=0 (Not in U.S.).

variable.name: YRDMINWK
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, questions 21 and 21.1. Minutes per week of physical activity from yardwork.

variable.name: YARDEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, questions 21 and 21.1. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from yard work in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: INHEAEXP
variable.description: Energy expended from heavy indoor chores (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, question 20. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from heavy indoor household chores in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: INACT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 42, questions 22 and 23. Hours per day of sedentary activity (sitting, sleeping or lying down).
